name: One World View (Cowboy's 100 Dollar Game Jam!)
name_original: One World View (Cowboy's 100 Dollar Game Jam!)
description:
This game was made for Cowboy's 100 Dollar Game Jam!

Your goal is to help your astronaut friend collect as many star coins as possible and reach the teleport portal. However, your controls are busted and you can only view one element of the environment at a time. 

WASD/Arrow Key - Walk

Spacebar/Up Arrow/W - Jump

1 Key - View Player/Coins

2 Key- View Platforms

3 Key - View Hazards

All assets were made by coreylr197.

Font is Wellbutrin by Apostrophic Labs
